entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`spin_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `value` TEXT)

indices.name: index_Spin_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Spin_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

indices.name: index_Spin_value
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Spin_value` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`value`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`wager_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `spin_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `color` INTEGER, `value` TEXT, `amount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `payout` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`spin_id`) REFERENCES `Spin`(`spin_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_Wager_spin_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Wager_spin_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`spin_id`)

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT value,  COUNT(*) AS `count` , (100.0 * COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spin WHERE value IS NOT NULL)) AS `percent` FROM Spin WHERE value IS NOT NULL GROUP BY value ORDER BY CASE value WHEN '00' THEN -1 ELSE CAST(value AS INTEGER) END

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
